long_description: The Harmony Web canoe seat is a great replacement option for your canoe. Heavy nylon webbing is especially durable, doesn't absorb water and resists UV light. Ash frame is strong yet provides some give to improve seating comfort. Standard design for bow or stern installation on canoes. The Harmony Web canoe seat can be easily cut to customize to your particular boat.
short_description: The Harmony Web canoe seat is a great replacement option for your canoe.
